title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 14 §§ 636-3.6 - Levels of Need for Certified Residential Services
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 14 §§ 636-3.6 - Levels of Need for Certified Residential Services

State Regulations
(a) OPWDD will
assess and determine whether an individual requires services in a residential
facility and the individual's level of need. (b) Levels of need for services in
residential facilities are designated by OPWDD to determine the prioritization
of individuals for available opportunities in residential facilities. (c) Levels of need are determined by OPWDD
and are based on factors including, but not limited to, level of care required
due to an individual's developmental or intellectual disability, availability
and adequacy of an individual's natural supports, and risk of harm associated
with an individual's current situation. Notes
